name: Little treasure hunters
description:
Are you ready for a dangerous adventure? Find all the secret treasures in the dungeon, but be careful, you are not the only one looking for them! Every pirate you find will lie to make you end up open a cursed chest, so say alert! Take advantage of their lies and do the opposite to find where the real treasures are hidden. Good luck!

Hey player, thank you for giving a try to my game. Feel free to share your oppinion as it will be very interesting for me to read, and will help me to become a better developer. I hope you enjoy Little Treasure Hunters!
